-- | Syntax instances for Attoparsec.

@package syntax-attoparsec
@version 1.0.0.0


-- | Provides a Syntax instance for Attoparsec.ByteString.Lazy.Parser.
module Data.Syntax.Attoparsec.ByteString.Lazy

-- | A wrapped <a>Parser</a>.
data WrappedParser a b

-- | Extracts the parser.
getParser :: WrappedParser a b -> a -> Parser b

-- | Extracts the parser.
getParser_ :: WrappedParser () b -> Parser b
instance Category WrappedParser
instance Products WrappedParser
instance Coproducts WrappedParser
instance CatPlus WrappedParser
instance SIArrow WrappedParser
instance Isolable WrappedParser
instance Syntax WrappedParser

-- | A wrapped <a>Parser</a>.
data WrappedParser a b
